name: Eskoliaon
description:
hello there  thanks for checking this game !

this game is just simple platformer game like the good old mario bros i used to play on NES unless it not much challanging as those game

for now, it will just available for PC, but i planned to port it to android if possible 

if you enjoy it, please consider share it with your friends or social media or whatever you want.. and if you don't mind, you can also give me your donation through my paypal link below :

https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/APerdana211

let me know you thought about this game, just leave your comment below

thank you !
